document.full_text: republican mike huckabee is riding high in the polls, but he could be running out of time to make up his mind on a run for his party's 2012 presidential nomination.
document.title: huckabee is high in polls, but on the fence for 2012
lines_and_colors: republican mike huckabee is riding high in the polls, but he could be running out of time to make up his mind on a run for his party's 2012 presidential nomination.
